column4: hi, how can anyone share how to package a software name logkeys.tar.gz, a software name buc.deb and my own software created using the BUC language, into a Deb file. the easiest way please
you want to put it in a ppa or not
step by step if u dont mind, im a newbie
install checkinstall using 'sudo apt-get install checkinstall'
then extract the tar.gz, and compile it. After compiling, run "sudo checkinstall"
the rest should be self explanatory
i am a real newbie. i write the prgram by BUC not python
you said you created the program, so you should be able to compile it.
err,,, BUC is more like a playing with html thing rather than a python style compiling
the original BUC is already in a DEB
sorry, don't know BUC. I don't read italian.
can tranlate to englishusing google translate, me not italian too :(
: sorry got to go soon.if u by any chance can get a work around, send me an email at inashdeen@gmail.com. thanks a lot in advance
